description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to development and implementation of Cybersecurity continious operataions policy and procedure.
name: HITRUST CSF - Business Continuity

values.description: Requirements are determined for information security and the continuity of information security management in adverse situations, e.g. during a crisis or disaster.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Business Continuity: 13.a Planning Information Security Continuity

values.description: The establishment and implemention of information security continuity controls is verified at regular intervals to ensure they are valid and effective during adverse situations.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Business Continuity: 13.c Verify, Review and Evaluate Information Security Continuity

values.description: Information processing facilities are implemented with redundancy sufficient to meet availability requirements.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Business Continuity: 13.d Availability of Information Processing Facilities

values.description: The required level of continuity for information security is established, implemented, and maintained during an adverse situation.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Business Continuity: 13.b Implementing Information Security Continuity
